text: Vladimir Tsepelyov (born 10 October 1956) is a retired long jumper who represented the USSR. He won two medals at the European Indoor ChampionshipsJalaca, Mirko, ed. Statistics Handbook. European Athletics. pp. 128, 132, 242. Retrieved 2010-12-17. as well as a bronze medal at the 1978 European Championships in Athletics."1978 European Championships in Prague, Czechoslovakia: Mens Results". Sporting-Heroes.net. title: Vladimir Tsepelyov
